tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_data_sets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data TEXT NOT NULL,
  annotations JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE annotations (
    annotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    annotation_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    label TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (dataset_id) REFERENCES datasets(dataset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE task_annotations (
    task_annotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id UUID NOT NULL,
    annotation_id UUID NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (annotation_id) REFERENCES annotations(annotation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE training_data_sets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data TEXT,
  task_type TEXT,
  annotations JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE annotations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  annotation TEXT,
  confidence FLOAT,
  data_set_id INT REFERENCES training_data_sets(id)
)

CREATE TABLE tasks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name TEXT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE datasets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  source TEXT,
  task_id INT REFERENCES tasks(id)
)
